overview: Preacher T.D. Jakes, the bishop of the nondenominational Potter's House church, shares his spiritual lessons about how to fortify friendships and relationships in this faith-based educational program. Discussing the realities of friendships and how they fit into our lives, Jakes encourages viewers to take a long, hard look at the advantages and responsibilities of friendships and how unconditional love and honesty fit into our relationships.
title: T.D. Jakes: Still Friends?
